meta.description: Language labels of Questionaire export module

languageKey.label: Delete results
Delete results on this page
With this module you can delete all survey results on this page. Be aware that the results will be removed completely.
Delete the results now
Confirmation about the removal of the results
Are you sure you want to remove all survey results from this page?
Yes, I'm sure
Deleting the results from the database
All survey results are removed from this page
An error occured while removing the survey results from this page!
